name: StarRupture
author: L4Curtis
description: StarRupture Dedicated Server running via Proton (Windows server on Linux). Uses Epic Online Services (EOS). Server password is created IN-GAME via Manage Server.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# StarRupture Dedicated Server Install Script

if [[ -z "$STEAM_USER" || -z "$STEAM_PASS" ]]; then
  STEAM_USER=anonymous
  STEAM_PASS=""
  STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
export HOME=/mnt/server

./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 3809400 validate +quit

# Steam libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
cp linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# Optional password reset
if [[ "$RESET_PASSWORD" == "1" ]]; then
  rm -f /mnt/server/Password.json
fi

echo "StarRupture installation complete"

variables.name: Server IP (MULTIHOME)
variables.description: Adresse IP d'écoute du serveur. Utilise 0.0.0.0 pour écouter sur toutes les interfaces.

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: Port principal du serveur (doit correspondre au port alloué par le panel).

variables.name: Query Port
variables.description: Port de requête utilisé par le serveur (EOS / discovery).

variables.name: Reset Server Password
variables.description: Supprime Password.json lors de l'installation pour forcer la redéfinition du mot de passe en jeu.
